issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I'm trying to create satisfactory windows phone application. I have android and ios versions, and now dealing with winphone. But there is one huge problem is performance. Opening of some screens takes 3-4 seconds. Time takes by creating of structure of screen (buttons, views etc.) Or adding a lot of rows to listview reduces performance =( 

There is some plan to fix it in future? Or for you it's okay? I can provide sample app which opens one screen from my working application, but I suppose that you undesrtand and know about this issue.
fields.summary: Windows: perfrormance of application is terrible

comments.body: Hello, We need separate sample code for each of the issues you have mentioned. We will test it in our environment. If we can regenerate we will escalate the ticket for a fix. Thanks.
